name: Under Controlled
description:
Fight your way though an endless robot horde, but be sure to plan ahead! 

At random time intervals, you will lose control of your legs, your aim, and your trigger finger, in rotation. Keep an eye on the error-detector, mind your surroundings, cannibalize your opponents for HP, and do your best to stay out of control.

To play, run the .exe file contained in the zip. The .exe and the .pck must be in the same folder for the game to work!
